meaningMnemonic: You know the word 足りる from Level 4. What is this one? it's the opposite (negative form on a verb is ない). So, what is the opposite of 足りる (To be sufficient)? The opposite is <vocabulary>to not be sufficient</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>not enough</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as 足りる (たりる) which you should have seen in Level 4.
